name: multisig
change:
v1.3
 - Removed an unneccessary permission that allowed the Dao to upgrade the plugin, because this is supposed to happens as part of the update itself. The unnecessary permission, which was granted on installation of previous versions, will be automatically removed with the update to this version.

prepareInstallation.description: The information required for the installation.

inputs.name: members
inputs.description: The addresses of the initial members to be added.

components.name: onlyListed
components.description: Whether only listed addresses can create a proposal or not.

components.name: minApprovals
components.description: The minimal number of approvals required for a proposal to pass.

components.name: target
components.description: The target contract to which actions will be forwarded to for execution.

components.name: operation
components.description: The operation type(either `call` or `delegatecall`) that will be used for execution forwarding.

inputs.name: metadata
inputs.description: The metadata that contains the information about the multisig.
